sentences.english: Both the structure and principles of design of an electrical furnace for melting enamel frit have been recommended.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了电熔搪瓷瓷釉熔炉的结构及设计原理。

sentences.english: In addition, the glaze belongs to calcium glaze in which plant ash was added.
sentences.chinese: 另外，白瓷釉可能是加有草木灰的钙釉。

sentences.english: A hardener is added to the acrylic enamel just before use.
sentences.chinese: 在用之前添加硬化剂到丙烯酸瓷釉中。

sentences.english: Discussed the influence on performance of sanitary ceramics glaze caused by spodumene.
sentences.chinese: 论述了锂辉石对卫生瓷釉料性能的影响。

sentences.english: Metal doors may be prefinished with baked - on enamel or vinyl -clad finishes.
sentences.chinese: 金属门可能会用瓷釉或包乙烯等末道漆进行粗加工。

sentences.english: This paper induct the major benefits of using spodumene in sanitaryware glaze.
sentences.chinese: 利用锂辉石在卫生瓷釉中的应用及其优点。

sentences.english: The sources of raw material of the Tang three-colors are scattered, and obviously not the same as other samples.
sentences.chinese: 唐三彩蓝釉料与其它耀州瓷釉料来源明显不同。

definition: (in ceramics, lacquerware etc) the base (made of clay, metal, bamboo etc) onto which a glaze, lacquer or other decorative elements are applied
celadon, classic Chinese style of ceramic glaze
